title: Full Stack Developer | Angular | .NET Core | SQL
description: Passionate about building dynamic and scalable web applications using Angular and .NET technologies. Experienced in crafting responsive UIs and backend services with clean architecture and performance in mind.
heading: About Me
subtitle: Creative Full Stack Developer
bioParagraphs: I'm Tamil Selvan, an Associate Software Engineer with over 3+ years of experience building intuitive, scalable, and performance-driven web applications. I specialize in Angular for front-end development and .NET Core for back-end services, crafting seamless digital solutions from end to end.

I thrive in agile environments, contributing to projects with a sharp eye for UI/UX, problem-solving, and code optimization. My expertise includes designing RESTful APIs, managing SQL Server databases, and developing tools like XML-based editors, automated PDF trackers, and SLA-driven service portals.
Beyond the code, I value collaboration, precision, and clarity-ensuring every product I build delivers real-world impact and user satisfaction.
experienceSubtitle: A timeline of my educational background and professional experience.
skillsubtitle: Technologies and frameworks I work with
ProjectSubTitle: A showcase of my recent work, highlighting the technologies and tools I’ve used to build impactful solutions.

education.label: HSC
education.title: Higher Secondary Education
education.description: Govt (B) HR SEC School, Porur, Chennai

roles.description: As an Associate Software Engineer, I focus on building and maintaining scalable web applications using Angular, .NET Core, and SQL Server. I’ve worked on improving performance and maintainability by refining system architecture and optimizing core logic—leading to a 15% increase in efficiency. By enhancing the front-end experience, I also helped reduce UI load times by 20%, making the applications faster and more responsive. I regularly participate in debugging, code reviews, and QA testing, which has helped minimize post-release bugs and maintain a consistent 99.9% application uptime.

As a Junior Software Engineer, I took on a more hands-on role working on both front-end and back-end components using Angular, .NET Core, and SQL Server. I collaborated with cross-functional teams to develop new features, enhance existing ones, and ensure seamless application performance. I also contributed to code reviews and testing, which helped identify issues early and improved system stability and reliability.

As a Trainee Software Engineer, I gained practical experience in full-stack development and the end-to-end software development lifecycle. I actively collaborated with senior developers in designing application modules, resolving UI-level defects, and improving code quality through structured guidance and review.

project.name: nEdit – Web-Based Academic Proofing Platform
bullets: Worked on nEdit, an online editing and proofing tool used by authors and editors to review and finalize academic journal content.
Built and improved features like image replacement, text formatting, footnotes, section/list creation, and Snapshot PDF downloads.
Helped enable real-time collaboration, allowing multiple users to edit and track changes together directly in the browser.
Integrated with backend systems using REST APIs to handle content saving, PDF generation, and proofing workflow updates.
Focused on creating a clean, responsive UI that supports math equations, reference editing, and live pagination, while maintaining XML structure compliance.

project.name: Employee Profiling & Performance Dashboard
bullets: Built a comprehensive employee profiling system to monitor and display individual and team performance for leadership review (CEO, COO).
Used ng-apexcharts to create dynamic graphs and visualizations for productivity trends, comparisons, and KPI tracking.
Implemented features like Excel export, smart filters, and role-based dashboards to improve visibility and decision-making.
Integrated RESTful APIs and secured routes using JWT-based authentication to ensure safe and reliable data access.
Led the complete frontend development lifecycle, from UI/UX to deployment and production support.

project.name: Vendor Management System (VMS)
bullets: Worked on a full-stack Vendor Management System to simplify vendor onboarding, payment handling, and document tracking.
Integrated the CCAvenue payment gateway to securely process vendor registration payments.
Built user-friendly, dynamic onboarding forms with validations and file upload to AWS S3, including progress tracking.
Developed tracking dashboards so admins could easily follow vendor onboarding progress and take necessary actions.
Handled file upload/download functionality, connecting the frontend with APIs and ensuring error handling worked smoothly.
Wrote and optimized SQL Stored Procedures to handle backend data operations cleanly and efficiently.

project.name: Sesame WMS – Article Workflow & Proofing Platform
bullets: Led the development of a web-based project management system for tracking and managing article workflows across publishing stages.
Enabled real-time visibility into the status of articles and issues, helping production managers easily monitor progress and meet due dates.
Integrated a PDF proofing system that allows authors to download, annotate, and re-upload corrected versions for approval.
Implemented dynamic workflows for articles and issues, configurable by admins for different journals and publishing processes.
Built features like article metadata editing, query management, and stage-wise activity tracking to streamline collaboration between authors, editors, and production teams.
Developed modules for Journal, Publisher, Issue, Mail Templates, User & Vendor Management, and comprehensive report generation.
Used AWS S3 for secure file storage and retrieval across different article lifecycle stages.

project.name: Personal Portfolio Website
bullets: Developed a modern, responsive portfolio website using Angular 20 to showcase skills, projects, and experience.
Built the entire site to be fully dynamic, loading content (projects, skills, socials) from a centralized JSON config file for easy updates.
Implemented a working contact form integrated with EmailJS to send messages directly via email.
Designed a clean, mobile-friendly UI using Tailwind CSS, with smooth scrolling, theme support, and interactive elements.
Deployed the site to [Hosting Platform, e.g., Netlify/Vercel] with continuous updates and optimizations.

project.name: GUIDE_COREAPI
bullets: Built a scalable RESTful API using .NET Core Web API designed for managing guide data.
Implemented JWT-based authentication to secure API endpoints.
Designed modular architecture for easy maintenance and extensibility.
Integrated Entity Framework Core with SQL Server for robust data access.
Added Swagger for interactive API testing and documentation.
Supports CRUD operations for guides with input validation and error handling.
